name: Busy Chef
description:
This project is entry for Games Job Fair Autumn 2022 - Unreal Engine Programming Challenge

Busy chef

Being a chef is not an easy task. You have to deal with a different range of customers - ones that are hungry and, therefore, angry... and ones that are angry and, therefore, hungry. The ones that want different side dishes, the ones that want to have mustard instead of ketchup. And then there are the ones who "want to talk to the manager" (without using the word "please", of course).

This game documents everyday struggles of a chef in a shoot'em up style game. Making every chef's wish come true, the player is able to shoot a customer straight to the heaven of satiety.
